flawed_nl_solution:
The difference in age between Joel and his dad is 32 - 5 = <<32-5=31>>31 years.
When you double this gap in years, you have 31 x 2 = <<31*2=62>>62.
When his dad is 62, Joel will be 62 / 2 = <<62/2=31>>31 years old.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 27, not 31. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
